item.title: GeForce NOW Gets South of Midnight, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, and Commandos Origins This Month
item.content:encoded:
https://wccftech.com/geforce-now-gets-south-of-midnight-clair-obscur-expedition-33-and-commandos-origins-this-month/

NVIDIA has revealed the GeForce NOW games additions that players can look forward to this week and for the rest of April. Most of the month's big PC releases will be included, starting with South of Midnight, Compulsion Games' first title after being acquired by Microsoft. Check back on Wccftech later today to read our full review of the action/adventure game. South of Midnight will be available to stream on NVIDIA's cloud platform even during the advanced access, which begins today for those who purchased the Premium Edition. The full launch is due on Tuesday, April 8.

Here's the rest of this week's GeForce NOW lineup:

· Cat Quest (Epic Games Store)

· Dark Deity 2 (Steam)

· Hero Siege (Steam)

· KARMA: The Dark World (Steam)

· Sky: Children of the Light (Steam)

· Train Sim World® 5 (Steam)

· Vivat Slovakia (Steam)

Throughout April, GFN users will be able to stream games like Commandos: Origins, a new entry in the revered real-time tactics series, The Talos Principle: Reawakened, and the highly anticipated JRPG Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, which is set in a fantasy world inspired by Belle Époque France.

Here's the full list of GeForce NOW games for April 2025:

· South of Midnight (New release on Steam and Xbox, available on PC Game Pass, April 8)

· Commandos Origins (New release on Steam and Xbox, available on PC Game Pass, April 9)

· The Talos Principle: Reawakened (New release on Steam, April 10)

· Night Is Coming (New release on Steam, April 14)

· Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree (New release on Steam, April 17)

· Sunderfolk (New release on Steam, April 23)

· Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 (New release on Steam and Xbox, available on PC Game Pass, April 24)

· Tempest Rising (New release on Steam, April 24)

· Aimlabs (Steam)

· Backrooms: Escape Together (Steam)

· Blood Strike (Steam)

· ContractVille (Steam)

· EXFIL (Steam)
